structure.unit: REPORT AND ACCOUNTING OF STATE FUNDS BY LOCAL OFFICERS

law.text: The Franklin Circuit Court shall have concurrent jurisdiction of all civil and criminal actions brought to enforce any of the provisions of subsection (2) of KRS 46.030 or of subsection (1) of KRS 46.990.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4701a-5.
